item.title: macOS 安装 minishift
item.description: MacOS环境安装minishift 安装minishift cli brew cask install minishift 使用virt

item.title: Kubernetes学习 — Macos安装Kubernetes
item.description: Kubernetes 安装 macos 检查环境 sysctl -a | grep machdep.cpu.features | grep VMX 安装VirtualBox http://download.virtualbox.org/virtualbox/5.1.26/Oracle_VM_VirtualBox_Extension_Pack-5.1.26-117224.vbox-extpack 安装minikube curl
